<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>sys_metadata</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>x_snc_automated_co_review_results</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>reviews</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	// Add your code here, such as current.addQuery(field, value);
current.addQuery('file_sys_id',parent.sys_id);
})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>file_sys_id</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-09 16:54:37</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ee77cd9bdb957200c2f3717bbf9619ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>reviews</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_ee77cd9bdb957200c2f3717bbf9619ec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-09 16:54:37</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ee77cd9bdb957200c2f3717bbf9619ec"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7b13e005dbbdb60043abfd441d961902
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SyncACRFiles</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SyncACRFiles</name><script><![CDATA[var SyncACRFiles = Class.create();
SyncACRFiles.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	copyACRFiles: function(){
		
		var g = new GlideRecord('x_snc_automated_co_acr_sources');
		g.addQuery('active','true');
		g.query();
				
		while(g.next()){						
			var jspr = new JavascriptProbe(gs.getProperty('x_snc_automated_co.ESLintMid'));
			jspr.setName('FileToMidServer'); //Any descriptive name will do
			jspr.setJavascript("var ddr = new ScriptSender();res = ddr.execute();");
			jspr.addParameter("targetFileName",g.file_name.toString());
			jspr.addParameter("encodedData",g.file_content);
			jspr.addParameter("path",g.path);
			jspr.create();			
		}
		
	},
	
	type: 'SyncACRFiles'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-27 10:59:57</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7b13e005dbbdb60043abfd441d961902</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SyncACRFiles</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy>none</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7b13e005dbbdb60043abfd441d961902</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-06 14:21:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1541b453db957200c2f3717bbf96197d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>ecc_queue</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="ecc_queue">queue=input^nameSTARTSWITHphp acr^EQ<item endquery="false" field="queue" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="input"/><item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="STARTSWITH" or="false" value="php acr"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ProcessACRResults</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	gs.log('In ProcessACRResults BR.');
	var helper = new XMLHelper(current.payload);
	var story,runningId,updateset,command;
	var obj = helper.toObject();
	
	var parameters = obj.parameters.parameter;
	for(var param in parameters){
		if(parameters[param]['@name'] == 'name'){
			command = parameters[param]['@value'];
			gs.log('name parameter found with value '+ command);
		}
		if(parameters[param]['@name'] == 'story'){
			story = parameters[param]['@value'];
		}
		if(parameters[param]['@name'] == 'runningID'){
			runningId = parameters[param]['@value'];
		}
		if(parameters[param]['@name'] == 'updateset'){
			updateset = parameters[param]['@value'];
		}
	}
	
	if(command.indexOf('acr.php') != -1){
		gs.setProperty('x_snc_automated_co.ACRConnectionStatus','Completed');
	}else{
		var results = JSON.parse(obj.result.stdout);
		if(results){
			var rulesObj = {};
			var rules = new GlideRecord('x_snc_automated_co_code_review_rules');
			rules.query();
			while(rules.next()){
				rulesObj[''+rules.number] = { 'lintLevel' : rules.lint_level+'' , 'ruleSysId' : rules.sys_id+''};
			}
			
			for(var result in results){
				
				var resultsPerFile = results[result].split(',');
				
				for(var rslt in resultsPerFile){
					
					var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_automated_co_review_results');
					var rsltSplit = resultsPerFile[rslt].split('-');
					var ruleno = rsltSplit[rsltSplit.length-1];
					
					gr.initialize();
					gr.file_sys_id = result;
					gr.running_id = runningId;
					gr.review_comments = resultsPerFile[rslt];
					gr.rule = rulesObj[ruleno].ruleSysId;
					gr.comment_level = rulesObj[ruleno].lintLevel;
					gr.update_set = updateset;
					gr.story_number = story;
					gr.insert();
				}
				
			}
		}else{
			var grr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_automated_co_review_results');
			
			grr.initialize();
			
			grr.running_id = runningId;
			grr.review_comments = 'no linting errors found.';
			
			grr.comment_level =  'Info';
			if(updateset){
				grr.update_set = updateset;
				grr.review_comments = 'no linting errors found for update set';
			}else if(story){
				grr.story_number = story;
				grr.review_comments = 'no linting errors found for story';
			}else{
				// finding the file sys id from the name parameter stored in command
				var commandTokens = command.split(' ');
				var argsJson = decodeURI(commandTokens[commandTokens.length-1]);
				gs.log('decoded JSON is '+argsJson, 'ACR');
				var fileArgs = JSON.parse(argsJson);
				var fileSysId;
				for (var key in fileArgs){
					fileSysId = fileArgs[key];
				}
				grr.file_sys_id=fileSysId;
				grr.review_comments = 'no linting errors found for the file';
			}
			
			grr.insert();
			
		}
		
	}
	
	current.state = 'processed';
	current.update();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-09 15:18:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1541b453db957200c2f3717bbf96197d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProcessACRResults</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1541b453db957200c2f3717bbf96197d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-07 08:39:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1541b453db957200c2f3717bbf96197d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>sys_update_set</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sys_update_xml</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Reviewable Objects</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	// Add your code here, such as current.addQuery(field, value);
current.addQuery('update_set',parent.sys_id);
// 	current.addQuery('type','Business Rule');
// 	current.addQuery('type','Client Script');
// 		current.addQuery('type','Script Include');
	
var queryString = "type=Business Rule^ORtype=Client Script^ORtype=Script Include";
//  var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');

 current.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
	
})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>application</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-07 10:23:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>577911aedb913200c2f3717bbf961969</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reviewable Objects</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_577911aedb913200c2f3717bbf961969</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-07 10:33:09</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=577911aedb913200c2f3717bbf961969"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_234c7f53dbd97200c2f3717bbf96198d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ScopedGlideEncrypter</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ScopedGlideEncrypter</name><script><![CDATA[var ScopedGlideEncrypter = Class.create();
ScopedGlideEncrypter.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	type: 'ScopedGlideEncrypter',
	
	getDecryptedString: function(encryptedString){
		
		var Encrypter = new GlideEncrypter();
		var decrypted = Encrypter.decrypt(encryptedString);
		return decrypted;
	}
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareeshhere</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-10 06:06:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>234c7f53dbd97200c2f3717bbf96198d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ScopedGlideEncrypter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_234c7f53dbd97200c2f3717bbf96198d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hareeshhere</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-13 16:21:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
